title: An Art Lovers' Guide
overview: Art historians Dr. Janina Ramirez and Alastair Sooke take us on three entertaining and revealing cultural city breaks.With sumptuous palaces, exquisite artworks and stunning architecture, every great city offers a dizzying multitude of artistic highlights. In this series, art historians Dr. Janina Ramirez and Alastair Sooke take us on three cultural city breaks, hunting for off-the-beaten-track artistic treats - and finding new ways of enjoying some very famous sights.
